g.text: %lower <= x <= %upper%the number of chance you have
LEDs light reflectswhich button you press

text.tspan: Hint: the answer is in given range

g.text: Define global variable ifint=false, count_down=0, mode_state[2]={0}, chance=0Define gpio 4b_1 ×2, 4b_2 ×4, 8b_2 ×8, 8b_3 ×8, 22 pins in total and LCD

How to determine press one time?We use while loop to restrain repeated input data. For instance, if user keep pressing the button, input register value will meet while loop condition.Therefore program will repeatedly read input register we write in while loop until input register value change to 0, in other words, user release the button.

text.tspan: Position : in right corner of LCD screen

g.text: Guess is close to Answerless than 50
Guess is close to Answerless than 50

Initialize global variable ifint=false, count_down=180, mode_state[2]={0}, chance=10Initialize LCD and gpio 4b_1 ×2, 4b_2 ×4, 8b_2 ×8, 8b_3 ×8, 22 pins in total, half of which are used as input and the others are used as LEDs light visualizing which button you pressSelect random number from time seed to be answer
if (checkint() == 0) blink_LED(OFF) printf("You Lose!!") printf("Press button to restart")
